runs.comm: excellent start, the ball pitches on off and middle stump and seams away from Vincent who gets squared up and is hit on the pad, perhaps a bit too high
another loud appeal for lbw, this one was fuller and straighter, Vincent tries to flick but misses, that was high as well and missing leg perhaps
Vincent steps down the pitch and makes room to drive to mid-off
pitches on a good length and seams away from Vincent who lets the ball go
Vincent charges down the pitch and lofts Odoyo high over mid-on, the ball bounces once before reaching the boundary and Kingsmead breaks into song
short of a length pitching on off and middle stump, Vincent waits on the back foot and closes the face of the bat to play the ball towards midwicket
banged in short outside the off stump, Vincent has the luxury to let the ball go, New Zealand aren't chasing a big total
good length ball angling into off and middle stump, defended on the front foot
pitches outside off stump and seams away from Vincent, too much seam movement that time, wide called
Vincent gets an inside edge on to a good length ball and squeezes it past his stumps to the fine-leg boundary
left alone again outside the off stump, New Zealand better not get used to this
good length delivery outside off stump, Vincent stands tall on the back foot and drives on the rise towards cover, that once bounced quite a bit from a  good length
played with soft hands towards midwicket for two more
slightly fuller on middle stump, Vincent lofts the ball off his pads into the vacant midwicket region, he didn't hit that perfectly but will get four
good length delivery on off stump, McCullum lunges forward and defends to cover point
fuller delivery on off stump, McCullum takes a step down the pitch and defends back to Odoyo
full length once again angling into McCullum's off stump, he strides forward and defends to cover
Odoyo's over-stepped this time, McCullum plays the ball to point for a single, free hit coming up
Vincent mis-times the pull, it wasn't short enough, the ball flies towards mid-on where the catch is dropped, it wouldn't have counted anyway
Odoyo strays down leg side, wide called
pitches just short of a length, the ball bounces sharply and cuts into McCullum who gets beaten between the bat and body
just a fraction short and McCullum latches on to it in an instant, he swivels and pulls powerfully over the midwicket boundary, that's only the second six of the match
Vincent tries to pull this time but doesn't make proper contact
this time he does makes contact, and how. Vincent gets into position early and pulls Ongondo over the midwicket boundary, powerful hit
defended on the front foot towards the off side
dabbed with soft hands towards cover point for a sharp single
McCullum pushes a good length ball towards midwicket, Vincent sprints off for the single but McCullum sends him back in time

McCullum gets on to the front foot and tries to flick on the leg side, he plays the shot too early and gets a top edge that flies high in the air towards third man, that went really high but still fell safely
Vincent tries to drive down the ground and gets an outside edge that flies wide of the fielder at cover and has enough pace to reach the boundary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
caught! Vincent tries to drive Odoyo on the up and ends up hitting it flat towards David Obuya at mid-off, Obuya has to dive forward to take the catch inches off the ground, excellent fielding!
good length ball outside the off stump, left alone by Fulton
pitches wide outside off stump and seams further away from Fulton
Odoyo overcompensates and strays on to the pads, Fulton leans across and flicks the ball towards long leg
he strays on to the pads once again, this time Fulton misses the flick but the ball clips the pad and runs past the wicketkeeper to the fine-leg boundary
McCullum tries to whip the ball from off stump through midwicket but gets hit on the pad in front of middle, that was close
banged in short outside the off stump, Fulton sways out of the way
good length delivery on off stump, Fulton leans forward and blocks
pitches short of a length on off stump, the ball stops a touch on Fulton who leans forward and punches it to cover, the fielder is on the circle and there's an easy single on offer
Fulton leans forward and plays a loose drive on the front foot, he gets a thick outside edge that flies behind point
McCullum pushes the ball off the front foot towards midwicket for a sharp single
full ball just outside the off stump, Fulton was terribly late on the drive and missed it completely, the ball just misses off stump
too short this time, Fulton swivels and pulls to deep midwicket where Tikolo has placed a man on the boundary
McCullum steps down the track, he's standing well outside his crease as he frees his arms and lofts the ball over extra cover for four more
fuller length on off stump, driven on the front foot towards mid-off
just a fraction short and McCullum comes forward and pulls it to deep backward square leg
Fulton stands his ground and lofts Bhudia down the ground to the long-off boundary
Fulton takes advantage of a short ball and smashes it into the midwicket stands, awesome shot, New Zealand need just six more
that's the victory, Fulton picks up a length ball off his pads and sends the crowd scurrying for cover at  midwicket, that was hit with sheer power
